title: DEVOPSdigest
author: Kenn Hussey Ambassador Labs
description: If you listen to thought leaders, QA is in its death throes. It's useless, it's expensive, and besides, we have machines to do that now. In my own experience, I've been working in organizations without dedicated QA teams for several years ... The transformation I'm talking about is where quality assurance has moved from a separate, final stage of development to one at the core
cndescription: 如果你听取思想领袖的意见，QA 正在走向死亡。它毫无用处，而且很昂贵，此外，我们现在有机器可以做这些。根据我自己的经验，我已经在没有专门的 QA 团队的组织中工作了几年……我所说的转型是质量保证从开发的独立最终阶段转变为核心阶段。
